title: I want my Replay Please
body: So because of the patch that came out today I am unable to save my replay of yesterday since it is older version now, this makes me sad, I just wanted to highlight my sweet gp skills. Is there any way of getting around this issue?

replies.body: We, unfortunately, don't have a way of getting replays that were saved on older patches. This really sucks that you weren't able to save that one before the patch came out =(.
